summary: Interactive app for Phuba Government High School
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- School logo or emblem in a circular badge style with academic imagery (school-logo.dim_200x200.png)
- Hero background showing an abstract educational theme with books, graduation cap, or school building silhouette in muted tones (hero-background.dim_1920x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a welcome homepage that displays the school name 'Phuba Government High School' with a hero section introducing the interactive features of the app
Implement a student directory section where users can view a list of students with basic information (name, class, student ID)
Create an announcements section where school administrators can post and view announcements with title, content, and timestamp
Implement a class schedule viewer that displays different class schedules organized by grade or section
Create an events calendar section showing upcoming school events with date, time, and description

Apply a cohesive educational theme with warm, welcoming colors (such as green and gold or navy and white), clear typography suitable for an academic environment, and a professional yet approachable layout that works well for students, teachers, and parents
